title: How can artists survive during the covid 19 pandemic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well - of the top of my head - WalMart and Amazon seem to be thriving, and they need people to stock the shelves and pack up stuff to be delivered, and even an artist can do that. Restaurants have increased their home delivery business, so they need people to deliver their orders, something else an artist should be able to do. And the fast food places still need people to flip the burgers and put the pizzas in the oven. An artist can do that. So, there is plenty of work out there. An artist can survive. Can’t say what will happen to their art, however -that’s probably going to suffer. But, hey, if we have to destroy the arts in order to combat the covid 19 pandemic, I guess that’s what we have to do. Although I have a feeling that, after the arts get destroyed, the covid 19 pandemic will still be with us.
Just the same way others do. In addition, please find your own safety zones and precautions there in and adhere to it.
